Dec. 2, 1984 D Tyldesley Contest (Section A)
Tyldesley Contest (Section A) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Tyldesley Contest tyldesley-contest-section-a
Sir Fred Longworth High School, Tyldesley, Lancashire Prizes - 1st £100 and cup, 2nd £70 and cup, 3rd £50 and shield. Best basses - Freckleton 11 bands competed.
Jan. 9, 2014, 9:33 a.m. Jan. 9, 2014, 9:56 a.m.
